article.title: Neubauer Assumes Dual-Hat Role in Pacific Region
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: Air Component Command/U.S. Combined Forces Command

article.text:
Brig. Gen. Kurt F. Neubauer, USAF, has been assigned vice commander, Seventh Air Force, Pacific Air Forces, and chief of staff, Air Component Command/U.S. Combined Forces Command, Osan Air Base, Republic of Korea.
Â
